resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Jewish Look at Substance Abuse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein jüdischer Blick auf Substanz-Mißbrauch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un regard juif à l'abus de substance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um olhar jewish no abuso da substância</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno sguardo ebreo ad abuso della sostanza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα εβραϊκό βλέμμα στην κατάχρηση ουσιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una mirada judía en el abuso de la sustancia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An important objective of any Health Education curriculum is to educate learners about the damaging effects of substance abuse. This webquest is designed to provide you with this important information, while also presenting Judaism's view on such abuse.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Damaging Effects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Substance Abuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Drugs and Alcohol</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein wichtiges Lernziel jedes möglichen Gesundheit
Ausbildung Lehrplans ist, Anfänger über die zerstörenden Effekte 
des Substanzmißbrauches zu erziehen. Dieses webquest ist 
konzipiert, um Sie mit diesen wichtigen Informationen, beim Ansicht 
des Judentums auch darstellen auf solchem Mißbrauch zu versehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un objectif important de n'importe quel programme 
d'études d'éducation sanitaire est d'instruire des étudiants au 
sujet des effets préjudiciables de l'abus de substance. Ce 
webquest est conçu pour vous fournir cette information importante, 
tout en également présentant la vue des judaïsmes sur un tel abus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um objetivo importante de todo o curriculum da 
instrução de saúde é educar learners sobre os efeitos prejudiciais
do abuso da substância. Este o mais webquest é projetado 
fornecê-lo com esta informação importante, ao também apresentar a 
vista do judaism em tal abuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un obiettivo importante di tutto il programma di 
studi di educazione sanitaria è istruire i principianti circa gli 
effetti offensivi di abuso della sostanza. Questo più webquest 
è destinato per fornirvi queste informazioni importanti, mentre però
presentando la vista del judaism su tale abuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας σημαντικός στόχος οποιουδήποτε προγράμματος 
σπουδών υγειονομικής αγωγής είναι να εκπαιδευτούν οι αρχάριοι 
για τα καταστρεπτικά αποτελέσματα της κατάχρησης ουσιών. 
Αυτός ο pjo' ωεψquεστ έχει ως σκοπό να παρέχει σε σας 
αυτές τις σημαντικές πληροφορίες, επίσης παρουσιάζοντας την όψη 
Judaism σχετικά με τέτοια κατάχρηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un objetivo importante de cualquier plan de 
estudios de la educación de salud es educar a principiantes sobre los
efectos perjudiciales del abuso de la sustancia. Este la ma's 
webquest se diseña para proveer de usted esta información 
importante, mientras que también presenta la opinión del judaísmo 
en tal abuso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerstörende Effekte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Substanz-Mißbrauch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jüdisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drogen und Spiritus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effets Préjudiciables</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abus de Substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Juif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Drogues et alcool</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeitos Prejudiciais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abuso Da Substância</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Drogas e álcool</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetti Offensivi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abuso Della Sostanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ebreo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Droghe ed alcool</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webquest</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
